title: Did CIA chief send spies into White House?
text: The whistleblower complaint that sparked President Trump’s impeachment inquiry is being joined by another. In the meantime Trump is blaming Energy Sec. Rick Perry for the scandal. Daniel McAdams of the Ron Paul Institute weighs in. In an announcement late Sunday night, the White House confirmed that US forces in northeastern Syria will start to withdraw from their positions, ahead of a military offensive planned by Turkey. The Chinese Basketball Association has can cancelled ties with the team with the Houston Rockets. The UAW strike against General Motors is entering its 4th week and contract talks have hit a snag after the union rejected the company’s latest offer.
description: The whistleblower complaint that sparked President Trump’s impeachment inquiry is being joined by another
